com.sillysoft.lux.util

Class CountryRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sillysoft.lux.util.CountryRoute

  • public class CountryRoute
extends java.lang.Object
    CountryRoute is a data structure that stores an ordered path of Country's.

      • append

        public CountryRoute append(CountryRoute other)
        Append the given CountryRoute onto the end of this one and return the result. Currently this is done in a very simple manner, there may end up being duplicates.

      • reverse

        Return a route that is the same as this one but in the reverse order.
